title: How do so many high elo players have such terrible winrates?
body: For the last 10 days I've been climbing and have been getting matched with a lot of Diamonds, Masters and Challengers, and it astounds me how so many of them have negative winrates. At least 35% of the people I have been matched with between Platinum and Challenger have had more losses than wins in their ranked season and I just don't understand how they can be at this elo with history like this. The only answer I see is that they're all boosted, but that statistically isn't correct, and some of them are even higher elo than they were in previous seasons. Someone please explain.
